item.title: FluxCD: Image Watcher
item.description: This time I want to bring up a cool GitOps tool beside ArgoCD named FluxCD. But I won’t discuss about what it is and the comparison between ArgoCD and FluxCD just yet. Instead, I find FluxCD has a cool feature of many features it provides which I don’t find this in ArgoCD (at least as the time as I write this topic). Probably, the introduction topic of FluxCD itself is worth having later on and it’s generally similar to ArgoCD as both work in the same area for Continuous Deployment.
